summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Dept.; authorizing the Director of Engineering to sign a "Response Order by Consent" between The City of Seattle and the Washington State Department of Ecology regarding a Remedial Investigation/Feasibility Study at the Midway Landfill; authorizing reimbursement to the Washington State Dept. of Ecology; ratifying and confirming the execution of agreements with consultants and contractors; authorizing the establishment of an Environmental Analyst, Associate, position in the Engineering Dept. for a period not to exceed two (2) years; and making an appropriation from the Solid Waste Fund therefor.
